title: Rule-Based Practitioner Training Program for Enhancing Argumentative Integrity

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of scientific argumentation structures and elementary logic principles
context.additional_context: Blended educational environment combining online platforms and offline workshops, aimed at enhancing the ability of science professionals to identify and address unfair elements in argumentation processes

learning_goals: Learners can identify 10 argumentative integrity criteria with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can successfully apply a five-step response strategy at least three times when encountering unfair argumentation cases.
Learners can improve argumentation error detection accuracy by over 30% in peer evaluation activities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
